text: aur hamane jo un kuphphaaron mein se kuchh logon ko (duniya kee) maal va daulat se nihaal kar diya hai tum usakee taraph haragiz nazar bhee na uthaana aur na unakee (bedeenee) par kuchh aphasos karana aur eemaanadaaron se (agarache gareeb ho) jhukakar mila karo aur kaha do ki mai to (azaabe khuda se) sareehee taur se daraane vaala hoon
